Package org.xadisk.bridge.proxies.interfaces

Interface Summary
Session This interface is used to invoke i/o operations on XADisk and to control the transaction associated with this session (use XADiskConnection instead of this interface when XADisk is used as a JCA Resource Adapter.
XADiskBasicIOOperations This interface declares a set of i/o operations which can be called on XADisk.
XADiskRemoteConnection This interface is applicable only when invoking XADisk as a JCA Resource Adapter.
XADiskRemoteConnectionFactory This interface is applicable only when invoking XADisk as a JCA Resource Adapter.
XAFileInputStream Represents an input stream to a file.
XAFileOutputStream Represents an output stream to a file.
XAFileSystem This interface represents a reference to an XADisk instance.
XASession This interface, like Session, is used by applications running in non-JCA environments.
 

Class Summary
XAFileSystemProxy This is a utility class for booting new XADisk instances and obtaining references to existing XADisk instances on the same JVM or remote JVMs.
 

Enum Summary
XADiskBasicIOOperations.PermissionType This enum enumerates the set of permission types required to perform read or write operations on files and directories.
